text: is a railway station operated by Kobe New Transit in Chūō-ku, Kobe, Japan. It is located on Port Island and is served by the loop portion of the Port Island Line, and trains only run northbound towards Sannomiya. == Ridership == {| class="wikitable" style="margin: 1em 0.2em; text-align: center;" |- style="background: #ddd;" !colspan="2"|Ridership per day |- !Year !Ridership |- |2011 |1,800 |- |2012 |1,724 |- |2013 |1,773 |- |2014 |1,840 |- |2015 |1,839 |- |2016 |1,775 |- |2017 |1,774 |} == Adjacent stations == ==References== ==External links== * Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1981 Category:Railway stations in Hyōgo Prefecture
title: Kita Futo Station
